resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="whitespace",
    filter=[
        {
            "type": "predicate_token_filter",
            "script": {
                "source": "\n          token.term.length() > 3\n        "
            }
        }
    ],
    text="the fox jumps the lazy dog",
)
print(resp)
